title: [Epidemiology] CDC study shows unvaccinated people are 29 times more likely to be hospitalized with Covid. Unvaccinated people were nearly five times more likely to be infected with Covid than vaccinated people.

[Medicine] Clinical efficacy of nitric oxide nasal spray (NONS) for the treatment of mild COVID-19 infection. NONS-treated (vs. placebo) patients had 16.2x lower viral loads at days 2 and 4, and their symptom resolution was also faster.
